ca.ualberta.app.adapter

Class AnswerListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
      • ca.ualberta.app.adapter.AnswerListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.ExpandableListAdapter, android.widget.HeterogeneousExpandableList

    public class AnswerListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
    Adapter for the answer list, used to display all answers to a question.

        public AnswerListAdapter(android.content.Context context,
                 int singleAnswer,
                 int singleReply,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Answer> answers,
                 Question question)
        Constructs the adapter and initializes its context.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context in which the adapter is running.
        singleAnswer - One answer in a answer.
        singleReply - One reply of an answer in the answer list.
        answers - The answer list.
        question - The question that the answer list belongs to.
